row.cell: The girls and my niece and nephew for Halloween. They all decided to be pirates, except for my niece, who had to be a doctor.
Tiffany had a birthday party in the backyard. She and her friends played musical pies. When the music stopped you had to smash your face into the pie. Yummy! And fun!
We went to a local seafood restaurant. We ordered crab and they brought these bibs for us to wear... so naturally we had to wear them : )

Hubby and I had a great date in St Augustine. We went to Lightner's Museum, walked around the town and enjoyed a nice lunch at the Columbia. This picture was outside of the Lightners before we went in.

The girls went to the top of the playground at the lake and took our picture. We love to go camping. We usually camp at a state park that has a wonderful lake to swim in, fish, and canoe. While camping we usually hike, play on the playground and share stories around the campfire : )
The girls and their cousin posing by a Christmas tree
All the cousins snuggled in bed in the morning. I walked out of our bedroom to find they opened the couch to a bed and all got in to watch tv. So cute!
This was in Gatlinburg. The girls took the picture for us. This day we went to the mountains and had a picnic. We played in the creek and that was when the girls snapped the shot of us.
We have friends that live there and we've gone many times to visit. This was one time that we went downtown and saw a couple of museums including the Martin Luther King Jr museum.
Ashley was on a field trip with school. Her daddy went with her. He goes on all field trips. Its his thing with the kids to let them know he's there and he cares.

We rent a cabin every year in the mountains of Georgia and vacation with friends. We love to go to the apple orchard and pick apples. We then come home and make lots of homeade applesauce for family and friends!
The girls were choosing which pumpkins they wanted and I couldn't resist a picture!
Sisters helping each other pick apples.
He was the only one that could reach the high branches. The best apples always seemed to be found at the top!
Both the girls sure do love their daddy!
We go to Mickey's Very Merry Christmas Party at Magic Kingdom every year.
I was posing with the girls and my niece and nephew before we entered the Magic Kingdom.
My nephew was "driving" the cars and every time he hit the center rail he would giggle at how I had to hold on for dear life. So naturally he kept doing it : )
The girls following their daddy down to the lake.
We were walking around the lake and the girls snapped a picture. Silly girls : )
The girls and I posed for a picture while we were hiking : )
The girls sat on the alligator statue and I had to take a picture.
The girls sat down by the Japanese Garden in the zoo to look at the reflection pond.
This is grandma and papa and some of the grandkids : )
Daddy climbed up to the eagle's nest with the kids at the zoo playground. He loves to play with the kids and never minds looking silly doing it.
The kids posed with daddy and our nephew on a statutue at the zoo.
We went to Night of Joy with our church. We had so much fun!
Some of the girl cousins took a break from walking around the zoo. I was able to snap a picture while they did.
The kids all took turns feeding the giraffe. The girls aunt and uncle where the ones to take them up to the giraffe while I snapped photos.
I was able to gather the cousins all together for a second to snap a picture : ) Right before they went and fed the giraffes with their aunt!
We love to be silly! We have fun, enjoy life, and make memories to last a lifetime!
Ashley wanted to take a picture of mommy and daddy!
We love to go to the ICE show every year for Christmas!
The girls and daddy stopped to look at the water fountain.
Ashley rode the Manta at Sea World. We snapped a picture before she took the big adventure.
The hotel Gaylord Palms is spectacular! We love going there every year : )
We live in Florida so naturally we LOVE the beach!
We tried our hand at camping at the beach. Had a blast, but it has just a few too many snakes and critters for our liking!
Daddy gave the girls flowers after their recital.
The girls posed for mommy before recital. This particular year the recital was called The Creation Story. (It's a Christian dance studio)
We had a blast at Universal! Daddy and Ashley love roller coasters so while they ride them Tiffany and mommy usually shop, and find some kind of yummy treat!
This was taken as we left the park. We were exhausted, but it had been a wonderful day!
This hotel is so much fun! We played games in the arcade, swam in the pool with a really cool alligator slide, fished, and even rented a bicycle that fit the whole family!
You can fish at Port New Orleans Disney Hotel! Daddy was helping Ashley catch a fish.
Ashley dancing at the Fall Festival.

This recital was Hansel and Gretel. It was a great recital! Tiffany broke her ankle 6 weeks before recital so she wasn't in it. Her being in it would have been the only thing that would have made it perfect.
This picture was the most recent recital 2012. I took this picture of the girls before recital began. All 4 of us were in this recital!
We played a queen and knight in this recital. This picture was taken at the end of recital.
One morning when the girls spent the night at grandma's Randy woke me up at 4 am. He surprised me with a sunrise breakfast at the beach! I took this picture of our feet in the sand to remember it.
We love a restaurant in St Augustine called Beach Combers! They have the best seafood!
Nana came to visit us and we took her to the beach! It was so much fun and she snapped this great picture for us!

In 2011 we all flew (including grandma and papa and our nephew) to Colorado to visit with family. My girls had never seen snow, so this day was especially fun when we went into the mountains to build snowmen, eat snow, sled and have snow ball fights!
This snowman wasn't very gorgeous but it was made out of love! Daddy and Papa helped all the kids make it : )
We went out to Wyoming to celebrate Ashley and great grandma's birthday (it's the same day) This was one of many different places we went to.
Daddy and our nephew played dress up at this great museum in Wyoming!

This is my daddy and my two brothers. They are the best! Papa loves the kids so much! Every year for the girls birthday grandma takes them shopping. Papa takes the other one on a "date". They've gone to the movies, car shows, and fishing. My brothers are great uncles and often do fun and wonderful things with the girls like pick them up from school and take them for ice cream!
This is my brother and his wife and children on their wedding day. They are a blended family of 5 children ; ) Notice there is only one boy...... we want to give him a boy cousin to play with!
This was one of our favorite trips! We went to Tennessee for a week. We went to the mountains, played putt putt golf, hiked, went to museums, shows, and of course Dollywood!
Nana was moving from North Carolina to Florida to be closer to us. We took a moment of time away from moving to go to the mountains.
This was on one of our many Disney trips. We wished in the wishing well for...... a baby brother ; )
We took our nephew to Disney for his 1st birthday! He loved it!
Nana lives in Tallahassee and this was one of the many times we've gone to visit. Its a beautiful state park with a great lake to swim in and gardens to walk around in.
This is my best friend from childhood. I have known her since I was 5. Unfortunately she lives far away, but I got to see her last year!
Daddy spent time with Tiffany to find apples.
They had so much fun eating these apples.... and picking them too : )
Lol Our friends that we go pick apples with took this for us.
We climbed this lighthouse. It had so many stairs! lol We had to stop at the top and enjoy the labor of our walk.
We went to a different beach than we normally go to. It was a lot of fun, but theres nothing like our little spot!
This is our cat. Her name is Hope. We also call her momma kitty.
We have a tradition of putting up our ornament on the Christmas tree and then sneaking a kiss : )
The cousins were playing out back. This was on Christmas day a couple of years ago.
We took the kids to eat at the TRex restauraunt. They had a blast!
Randy was playing legos with our nephew at Downtown Disney.
This was on one of our many Disney trips. We were on the boat going across the lake.
This is one of my favorite pictures with my husband!
The girls loved getting their faces painted! Don't they look so cute!?
We love having random silly string fights. All the cousins each get a can and then BAM they are all covered in string!

We went to a park to have a picnic and it rained! We stayed in the car until it stopped and had the best time! The kids shared jokes and just laughed and laughed. The rain then stopped and we were able to get out and play on the playground (and get a little wet)
Randy works 4 days a week. When the girls are at school we usually have a "date" day every so often. This was on one of our dates. We went hiking at the lake.

Happy Halloween! This picture was of the girls and one of my nieces and nephew before we went tricker treating this past Halloween. Everyone always comes to our house (our neighborhood is full of kids) and then we eat pizza and walk around the neighborhood as a family!
This was at a Christian concert called Winter Jam. Randy and I took the youth from church along with our family. It was such an inspirational time.
There is a church with this beautiful cross and gardens in St Augustine Florida. We go every year and light a candle in the church.

We participate every year in the local Christmas parade. Every year we dress up differently and design a different float with some great friends and enter into our local parade. You never know what we'll be coming up with next!
Tiffany is feeding the ducks off of the dock.
Great Grandma flew here for Christmas. This is with my nieces and daughters.
This was Christmas Eve. We spend Christmas Eve as a big family every year at Grandma and Papa's then we spend Christmas Day at home with our own families. This is my nephew and his parents.
The girls and daddy love to rock climb. Nothing professional, but lots of fun just the same. (I'm afraid of heights!)
We had one of our nieces spend the night and she and the girls played outside almost all day long. They were enjoying the nice Florida weather.
Randy and his momma at the beach on the 4th of July
Swimming at Grandma and Papa's pool.
They posed by the elephant statue. We have zoo passes so we go to the zoo often.
The girls were coloring Easter eggs with grandma. This is just one of the many times we get together with family : )
All the kids in front of the Christmas tree. LOL One of the only pics we have with everyone because we can hardly ever get all the kids to cooperate and take a picture altogether : )
The boys eying the table. lol We know what makes them happy! It was full of desserts. Yummo!
This is one of my girls uncles. He is with my nieces in this picture.
Ashley shares her birthday with her great grandma. How cool is that?
This is me and only half of my cousins. We were all together for Easter last year.
This was great grandma with all of her great grandchildren (at the time, more have been born since) in the same room for the first time ever! The great grandkids all live in 4 different states.
Can you tell these two are daddy's girls? Mommy needs a momma's boy : )
This is at the Japanese Garden at the zoo in front of the cherry trees.
Before we started swimming we snapped some photos. This is one of the girls favorite water parks.
The family picture in front of the Smoky Mountains sign. We loved the Smoky Mountains.... so beautiful!
Nana was with us this year for Thanksgiving and took this picture for us.
We were camping in November and played a game of baseball. It was so much fun!
Grandma and Papa in front of us on the Aladdin's Magic Carpet Ride.
He loves to fly planes and helicopters. He also builds model airplanes. We also enjoy watching him fly them too.
Papa reads the kids this book every year on Christmas Eve before we leave for the night. This particular Christmas Eve, Ashley was the only one left awake : )
We were part of the girls dance recital. We had so much fun! We love to enjoy life
We were walking at the lake. Our daughters took this picture. We love to camp, hike,a nd just enjoy the outdoors.

My neighbors have 5 beautiful kids! We love each one of them and are super close to their family. I sometimes watch the kids when their mom has an errand to run. This is their latest baby boy. I am hoping that my son and this sweet boy can be best friends!
We wish for a baby brother!
We all had so much fun at the water park in Jekyll Island.
This hotel was amazing! Even better was that it has pirtate themed rooms : )
At the Caribbean Hotel at Disney they have this great lake that you can rent boats and paddle boats. The girls took this picture in front of the lake
We rented a boat on the lake at the hotel. The girls took this picture for us : )
This and Randy and his momma, the girls Nana.
The girls love to swing in the hammock outside of our hotel room on the beach at Disney!
The hotel has an amazing pirate pool! We cant wait for our future son to come along so that we can take him there!
It was a beautiful day at the beach!
We spent the afternoon at the beach collecting shells with the girls! So much fun!
We are so in love with our future son! We will forever love you for allowing us to raise him!
We went to see Winter at the Clearwater aquarium
This is Crystal's parents. Grandma and Papa went with us to Busch Gardens. It was so much fun!
My little brother, Randy, and I all spent a day kayaking to Little Talbot Island. We found so many \"treasures\" we brought back to the girls: whole shells, feathers, coconut, driftwood.
Tiffany next to a turtle at the Clearwater Marina
These are just some of our Christmas decorations in the dining room :-)
The grand kids helped grandma and papa put up Christmas ornaments on their tree. They took a minute to be silly with their new puppy- Ginger.
Ashley helping her cousin put up bulbs on the tree :-)
Having fun playing around at Disney
I\'m already in love with a child I have never even met :-)
I will always love ALL of my little angels!
We go to Mickey's Very Merry Christmas Party every year. We always have so much fun!
Standing in front of the tree at Magic Kingdom
The girls shopping at Downtown Disney with us
The boys at a \"picture spot\" at Downtown Disney.
Tiffany spending some time with one of her favorite uncles :-)
Wearing her Minnie Mouse Santa hat!

One of our good friends and photographer- Lauren K Photography- took this picture for us. I love it! We are always laughing around and playing together and I think this picture captures the essence of that!
A beautiful family picture at a wonderful local park
I love this picture! We all love each other so much- we do everything together and this picture captures the fun and love we have with each other.
